info.title: Baas Profile
info.description:
Baas Profile

API responsible for registering a person Persons Status
Status Description Final Status Notification Event Type
IN_PROGRESS in progress to register person
INACTIVE Inactive registration
ACTIVE Active register yes profile-person_done
ERROR Error registering person yes profile-person_error

Status Change Notification

As described in the status table, ACTIVE and ERROR will trigger notifications. In order to be notified, it's necessary to have the notification URL (provided by the client) configured in the service. The notification is a POST request and it's described below: Notification Request Scheme Headers: ```json { X-R4-Application: GUID // Application Unique Identifier X-R4-Delivery: GUID // Attempt Unique Identifier X-R4-Event: {event_type} // Event type of the notification (see Person Registration Status table) User-Agent: R4-Hookshot } ``` Body ```json { "object_kind": "{event_type}", // Event type of the notification (see Person Registration Status table) "object_id": "GUID", // Person Unique Identifier "application_id": "GUID", // Application Unique Identifier } ```
